sentences.sContent: It was an odd thing to say.
There was something odd about him.
What she did was unforgivable, but the odd thing was he didn’t seem to mind.
sentences.sCn: 她的所作所为是不可原谅的，但奇怪的是他好像并不在意。

sentences.sContent: She was holding an extremely odd-looking weapon.
sentences.sCn: 她手持一件非常奇特的武器。

synos.tran: [数]奇数的；古怪的；剩余的；临时的；零散的

phrases.pCn: 出人意料互不相配的一对

words.tran: 零头；碎屑；零碎物件；奇特的东西

trans.tranOther: different from what is normal or expected, especially in a way that you disapprove of or cannot understand
